ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Why have you hurried on ahead of your people, Musa?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What made you hurry away, O Moses, from your people?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But, O Moses, what has made you come in haste from your people?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord asked, "Moses, what made you attend your appointment with Me before your people?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And why did you come in haste ahead of your people, O Moosa?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what made you hasten from your people, O Musa
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what caused you to hasten from your people, O Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What has sped thee far from thy people, Moses?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (it was said): What hath made thee hasten from thy folk, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [When Moses was upon the Mount, God said,] "O Moses, why have you come with such haste from your people?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what hath made thee hasten from thy people, O Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [God said,] ‘O Moses, what has prompted you to hasten ahead of your people?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (When Moses was up on the Mount, Allah said:) "What made thee hasten in advance of thy people, O Moses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what made you hasten from your people, O Musa (Moses)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses, why have you come with such haste from your nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And what made you rush ahead of your people, O Moses?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:83] ‘And what has hurried you [to depart] from your people, in order to come to the appointed time to receive the Torah, O Moses?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When Moses was about to go with the seventy chosen men to the tryst, he hastened and went ahead of them; (And (it was said)) Allah said to him: (What hath made thee hasten from thy folk, Moses?
